<div class="treeview">
<onlyinclude>
** {{nbt|compound|minecraft:custom_model_data}}: A list of values used by [[items model definition]]s for model selection and coloring.
*** {{nbt|list|floats}}: A list of {{nbt|float|floats}} for the {{cd|range_dispatch}} model type. Missing values return the {{cd|fallback}} model.
*** {{nbt|byte-array|flags}}: A list of {{nbt|boolean|booleans}} for the {{cd|condition}} model type. Missing value returns the {{cd|is_false}} model.
*** {{nbt|list|strings}}: A list of {{nbt|string|strings}} for the {{cd|select}} model type. Missing value returns the {{cd|fallback}} model.
*** {{nbt|list}}{{nbt|int-array|colors}}: A list of RGB values for the {{cd|model}} model type's {{cd|tints}}. Missing values return the {{cd|default}} value provided by the item model definition. Each entry can either be a list of floats or an integer. Any provided lists automatically convert to an integer, so the component is saved as an int array.
**** {{nbt|int}}: An RGB color code converted to a decimal number. It can be calculated from the Red, Green and Blue components using this formula:<br>'''<span style="color:red">Red</span>[[wikipedia:Logical shift|<<]]16 + <span style="color:green">Green</span><<8 + <span style="color:blue">Blue</span>''' {{Calculator|decimalColor}}
**** {{nbt|list}}: A list containing 3 floats corresponding to red, green, and blue values as a fraction (ranged 0 to 1, inclusive). Automatically converted to the integer format when saved.
